EmailTemplate.name: RE: Potential work for Michael Leadon (1358359273.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Potential work for Michael Leadon (1358359273.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - Standard Template - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Michael, Thanks so much for sending this, unfortunately the form needs to be signed and dated in section two by a notary. Here is a list <http://www.mbopartners.com/notaries> of notaries we have worked with who should not give you any trouble. Sorry for the inconvenience, E-Verify is really strict about this. Thanks, Sara ___________________________________ SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Michael Leadon [mailto:mleadon@yahoo.com] Sent: Tuesday, January 15, 2013 7:11 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: RE: Potential work for Michael Leadon Hi Sara, Here’s my I9, and passport. Thanks, --Michael From: Sara Conde [mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>] Sent: Tuesday, January 15, 2013 8:33 AM To: Michael Leadon Subject: RE: Potential work for Michael Leadon HI Michael, Yes, that makes total sense. I have done many of these set ups before. We would set it up so his invoice was paid from your MBO account thus, Long does not touch the client billing at all. I will let Nicolette know that I will be the contact. Thanks Mike, looking forward to working with you!Sara ___________________________________ SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdl1ctEN55dyAI6HikHvDdZXC0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdl1ctEN55dyAI6HikHvDdZXC0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdl1ctEN55dyAI6HikHvDdZXC0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdl1ctEN55dyAI6HikHvDdZXC0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Michael Leadon [mailto:mleadon@yahoo.com <mailto:mleadon@yahoo.com>] Sent: Monday, January 14, 2013 8:15 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: Potential work for Michael Leadon Hi Sara, Nice to meet you Sara. We will fill out the I9 forms and have them returned to you. We hope to set up an organization in the team structure. I previously had an organization set up within MBO called, Road Warrior Network. I would be the team leader and Long will come on as part of the team. Currently, Long's name would not appear on any of the paperwork (MSA or SOW), and we wanted to validate that I could transfer money to him directly from my account. I will send the contact information for my contact at Taborda Solutions tomorrow along with their MSA. Thanks, --Michael Michael Leadonmleadon@yahoo.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:mleadon@yahoo.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdl1ctEN55dyAI6HikHvDdZXC0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>(408)5040458 FYI, I had sent an email to my old consultant advisor, Jessica Martin, and was informed by Jessica Hartman that she no longer works there, and that a Nicolette Taylor would contact me tomorrow. From: Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdl1ctEN55dyAI6HikHvDdZXC0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>> To: Long Su <longsu@gmail.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:longsu@gmail.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdl1ctEN55dyAI6HikHvDdZXC0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>>; Michael Leadon <mleadon@yahoo.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:mleadon@yahoo.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdl1ctEN55dyAI6HikHvDdZXC0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>> Sent: Monday, January 14, 2013 3:41 PM Subject: RE: Potential work for Michael Leadon Hi Long and Michael, So nice to meet you via email, and welcome back to MBO! Please consider me your point of contact and follow the steps below to complete your re-enrollment. ? Log in to the MBO site www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdl1ctEN55dyAI6HikHvDdZXC0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>? Click the “Enrollment” link once you are logged in? Confirm contact information ? Print out I-9 at the end of the enrollment? You will sign/date section 1 and local notary will sign/date section 2 (most people visit their local bank.) Please email or fax back to MBO (we do not need an original copy.) If you use a US passport as supporting documentation I will need an image of it to comply with E-Verify (most people just take a picture with their phone and then email it to me.)? Send me your clients contact information (name, email, phone number) and I will reach out to get a contract in place. ? The link to my private page can be found here <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/advisor-info-s-conde.html?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdl1ctEN55dyAI6HikHvDdZXC0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> there are lots of great resources on this page and I encourage you to bookmark it. Please contact me with any questions. Take care,Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCd15XslRjy%2FuUI6Dh0TbPd%2FLC0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdl1ctEN55dyAI6HikHvDdZXC0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdl1ctEN55dyAI6HikHvDdZXC0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdl1ctEN55dyAI6HikHvDdZXC0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCd15XslRjy%2FuUI6Dh0TbPd%2FLC0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdl1ctEN55dyAI6HikHvDdZXC0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Long Su [mailto:longsu@gmail.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:longsu@gmail.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdl1ctEN55dyAI6HikHvDdZXC0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>] Sent: Friday, January 11, 2013 7:30 PM To: Sara Conde Cc: Michael Leadon Subject: Potential work for Michael Leadon Hi Sara, I am an alumni of MBO since 2005, and have not been active for a while. Recently I talked to Michael Leadon who is also an alumni of MBO and that he has some work for me. I wonder if you can reinstate both of our accounts and also put mine under Michael’s business group, so that when he is paid by the client (in an upcoming SOW), he can also pay me for the portion of work I do for him. I’ve copied this email to Michael so he can give you more details. Thanks, LongPhone: 909-532-0116MBO Associate ID: 2856
